data.message:
Coca-Cola
Got an idea for an advert for you, perhaps show a side by side view of the life of a coke bottle. One that gets recycled vs one that gets thrown out a moving car.

This should help inform people of your own recycling processes and what can happen if they don't recycle. 

Probably a bit too serious for a coke advert but hey. Enjoy Coke, Enjoy life. XD

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion James, we'll be sure to share it with our team :)
